content.query:
/*
We have these queries:
1. Number of restaurants by business tag for given CITY, ZIP CODE, BUSINESS TAG, MENU ITEM CATEGORY
    A. Bar chart
    B. Pie chart
*/

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE [GetAveragePriceDifferenceByRestaurantName]
@Submarket NVARCHAR(255) = NULL,
@ZipCode NVARCHAR(255) = NULL,
@TagName NVARCHAR(255) = NULL,
@MenuItemCategory NVARCHAR(255) = NULL,
@DateFrom DATETIMEOFFSET = NULL,
@DateTo DATETIMEOFFSET = NULL
AS
SELECT TOP 100
    [Restaurant].[Name],
    AVG([MenuChange].[CurrentDisplayPrice] - [MenuChange].[PreviousDisplayPrice]) AS [AveragePriceDifference]
FROM
    [MenuChange]
INNER JOIN [Restaurant] ON [MenuChange].[RestaurantId] = [Restaurant].[RestaurantId]
INNER JOIN [Location] ON [Restaurant].[RestaurantId] = [Location].[RestaurantId]
INNER JOIN [Tag] on [Restaurant].[RestaurantId] = [Tag].[RestaurantId]
WHERE
    (@Submarket IS NULL OR [Restaurant].[Submarket] = @Submarket) AND
    (@ZipCode IS NULL OR [Location].[ZipCode] = @ZipCode) AND
    (@TagName IS NULL OR [Tag].[Name] = @TagName) AND
    (@MenuItemCategory IS NULL OR [MenuChange].[Category] = @MenuItemCategory) AND
    (@DateFrom IS NULL OR [MenuChange].[CreatedOn] >= @DateFrom) AND
    (@DateTo IS NULL OR [MenuChange].[CreatedOn] <= @DateTo)
GROUP BY
    [Restaurant].[Name]
HAVING
    AVG([MenuChange].[CurrentDisplayPrice] - [MenuChange].[PreviousDisplayPrice]) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY [AveragePriceDifference] DESC
GO
